org.astrogrid.community.webapp
Class AccountBean

java.lang.Object
  org.astrogrid.community.webapp.AccountBean

public class AccountBean
extends java.lang.Object

A Java bean to give acccess to account details.

Author:
Guy Rixon

Constructor Detail

AccountBean

public AccountBean()
Constructs a AccountBean.

Method Detail

getUserName

public java.lang.String getUserName()
Reveals the user name. This is the not qualified with a community name, e.g. fred rather than fred@foo/community. The user name is what the user types into the log-in dialogue.

Returns:
The user name (null if the bean is not initialized).

getCommonName

public java.lang.String getCommonName()
Reveals the common name. This is the user's name in society, e.g. Fred Hoyle. It is used to form the common-name field of the user's credentials.

Returns:
The common name (may be null).

getDistinguishedName

public javax.security.auth.x500.X500Principal getDistinguishedName()
Reveals the distinguished name. This is the subject from the user's credentials, e.g. C=UK,O=Cambridge,OU=IoA,CN=Fred Hoyle.

Returns:
The distinguished name (may be null).

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
Reveals the description of the user.

Returns:
The description (may be null).

getEmail

public java.lang.String getEmail()
Reveals the user's email address.

Returns:
The email address (may be null).

getHomeSpace

public java.lang.String getHomeSpace()
Reveals the user's home space. This is an IVORN for the user's top-level node in VOSpace.

Returns:
The home-space IVORN (may be null).

isStored

public boolean isStored()
Reveals whether the information in this bean is present in community storage. False is returned only when a new account is being created. In this case, the information in the bean has not yet been committed to storage.

setUserName

public void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
Specifies the user name and loads accounts details from storage.

setCommonName

public void setCommonName(java.lang.String commonName)
Updates the common name in the database.

setDescription

public void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
Updates the description in the database.

setEmail

public void setEmail(java.lang.String email)
Updates the email address in the database.

setHomeSpace

public void setHomeSpace(java.lang.String homeSpace)
Updates the home space in the database. If the given homespace is null or an empty string, creates a new space in the community's configured VOSpace.

getBasicAccount

protected org.astrogrid.community.common.policy.data.AccountData getBasicAccount(java.lang.String userName)
Raises the basic account data from the community database. If this fails, most of the fields of the result will be null.

setBasicAccount

protected void setBasicAccount(org.astrogrid.community.common.policy.data.AccountData ad)
Updates the basic account data in the community database.
